basicInfo.name: Arturs Vaitilavics
basicInfo.title: Junior Software Developer
basicInfo.aboutMe: I have been working in Global visual effects (VFX) companies for over 10 years, VFX is closely related to programming, and I have always used bits of code to automate mundane everyday tasks. Writing scripts became my favourite part of my work, and I decided to study Java, Python and C#. Quick learner, patience, responsibility and Procedural aproach are the qualities that I have developed over the years of work and studies.

education.subject: Java from scratch (378 hours)
education.description: Java, Design patterns, Software testing, Git, Databases, Framerworks: Spring, Hibernate, Front End: JS, HTML and CSS

education.subject: Computer Sciences
education.description: Basics in programming, C++, ActionScript, Linear algebra, Mathematical analysis, Descrete mathematics, CorelDraw, Adobe Flash, Premiere Pro

work.description: Worked with software: Fusion, Filme Maker Pro. My tasks included Rig removal, s3D conversion, managing team of 8-15 artists, training new artists, delegating tasks, QA final output, script QA, assist with problems
Worked with softwares such as Fusion for rig removal and s3D conversion, Syntheyes for matchmove, Maya for Environment modeling and File Maker Pro for asset managment.
Trained over 300 artists in s3D conversion, new artists, and up the skill for senior artists. All training done during production.
Worked on two full cgi projects. Animated music video and promo video for textile factory.
Lighting and Compositing for animated comercial for Clarks shoes.
Compositing artist for Talking Tom Youtube serise. Done more than 3 episodes during 4 month period.
Compositing for Messy goes to Okido kids series. Fast pace work with high level of consistency.
Lighting artist for teaser trailer for Magic Molly. Compositing artist for Playmobil spy episode.
Compositing artist for feature films and Netflix documentary
CG modeling, texturing, animation and compositing in AE for Large Resolution Video Walls for MS experience centers( use to called Stores)
Material work, and lighting product renders for Store and Print. Highest consistency and qualty required.
